headline: Scale new member recruitment
campaignDescription: With more competition for the time and attention of girls than ever before, Girl Scouts of the USA must continually innovate its approach to connecting with members, parents, and volunteers and sharing the transformative impact the organization has on the lives of those it serves. With this mission in mind, C&C worked in close collaboration with the Girl Scouts marketing team to scale the organizationâ€™s new member recruitment funnel, engaging diverse communities of girls and their parents across platforms including Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and search, reinvigorating messaging and creative, strategically amplifying messages among Spanish-speaking communities and in council locations with the greatest capacity, and ultimately building an optimized lead-generation model that helped Girl Scouts to double its new member growth year-over-year.
supportiveText: Doubled new member acquisitions, while cutting acquisition costs by 50%
